replies.body:
LOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOL.

Ok, I gotta say. I've owned a (Windows: Laptop, Phone (Samsung etc), Desktop etc.) 
(Apple: Phone, Macbook)

Alright, to a certain degree you are right. Apple is in fact a little better, but it absolutely sucks for gaming, Im not talking gear, like a Geforce, or and Intel i7 4930k... But the layout of the whole OS is just crap for Apple's desktops... Their mice are just one button, Im not sure if they recreated the OS, but 1 button isnt going to cut it, especially when you need to hold "Ctrl" key or whatever, to actually Right click (Pretty sure those were old OS's)

Now Windows... I cant stand the Microsoft cant get their shit together for viruses... Sure, its you're fault that you get a virus and you dont have an anti-virus... Im not talking about those... Im talking about

Jerusalem, RedAlert, Storm, Nimda etc.
(https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QIqA66eYpC0)

Those were mostly Trojan Horses, that hid in Emails, or sometimes even having a direct connection to the internet, and you not doing anything, yet still get affected... As with apple, their OS is much more sophisticated, and needs a lot more knowledge to hack or create a virus for it... And before you say "Apple isnt popular around the world, thats why"... Buy a mac then see..

TBH Apple and Windows and Microsoft in general all have their pros, and cons... I dont see the point in them arguing about each other.. they are both great Companies, and I'm happy they exist, and if they merge together, they will probably become a WAY better OS than Microsoft or Apple is at this day. Feel free to Adjust any points I made, as I probably made quite a few mistakes...
